title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\ExecutePatchJobRequest
name: ExecutePatchJobRequest
description:
A request message to initiate patching across Compute Engine instances.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.ExecutePatchJobRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project in which to run this patch in the form projects/*

params.name: data.description
params.description: Description of the patch job. Length of the description is limited to 1024 characters.

params.name: data.instance_filter
params.description: Required. Instances to patch, either explicitly or filtered by some criteria such as zone or labels.

params.name: data.patch_config
params.description: Patch configuration being applied. If omitted, instances are patched using the default configurations.

params.name: data.duration
params.description: Duration of the patch job. After the duration ends, the patch job times out.

params.name: data.dry_run
params.description: If this patch is a dry-run only, instances are contacted but will do nothing.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Display name for this patch job. This does not have to be unique.
